en.sc2:
Here is a visual explanation of our SORTING Problem notation. We have:
Input: An unsorted array of records R1, R2, ..., Rn with associated key values K1, K2, ..., Kn,
en.sc3: Output:: Some permutation Ks1, Ks2, ..., Ksn such that Ks1 <= Ks2 <= ... <= Ksn.
en.sc4: Here is an example of a SORTING instance an unsorted array as input and a corresponding sorted array as output.
